required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Accuracy of a Newly Developed Mobile Application Versus the Conventional Method of Cephalometric Analysis in the Diagnosis of Dental and Skeletal Deformities Among Pre-adolescent Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Accuracy of a Newly Developed Mobile Application Versus the Conventional Method of Cephalometric Analysis in the Diagnosis of Dental and Skeletal Deformities Among Pre-adolescent Patients: A Diagnostic Accuracy Study

brief_summary.textblock: This study aims to evaluate the accuracy of a newly developed mobile application versus the conventional method of cephalometric analysis in the diagnosis of dental and skeletal deformities among pre-adolescent patients.

detailed_description.textblock:
A mobile application will be developed to help pedodontists in orthodontic diagnosis, and treatment of dentoalveolar, or skeletal deformations ,The mobile application will provide quick cephalometric analysis and therefore, offers rapid and accurate case diagnosis, reduces errors in tracing, measurement, and identification of the landmark.
Reference test: Cephalometric analysis by the conventional method
-Trial design: Diagnostic accuracy study

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: A newly developed mobile application will be developed to help pedodontists in orthodontic diagnosis, and treatment of dentoalveolar, or skeletal deformations

primary_outcome.measure: The Accuracy of the newly developed mobile application versus the conventional method of cephalometric analysis in the diagnosis
primary_outcome.description: The accuracy of the mobile application will be measured based on cephalometric analysis angles( by degrees) of Egyptian people according to Soliman SA. PHD thesis 1988

arm_group.arm_group_label: Lateral cephalometric radiographs of pre-adolescent patients (8-13) years old.

intervention.description: The application will be developed in native Android, using Java (backend) and XML (front-end) as the programming language. The program of choice will be Android Studio速, YouTube速 (video reproduction) and Firebase速 (database) will be used as external APIs (Application Programming Interfaces). The layout of the application will be developed using: Adobe Illustrator速 software. The logo, brand, objects, and shapes of the mobile application will be designed to enable to resize of the images without any loss of quality, due to the wide range of scales available in current smartphones
intervention.arm_group_label: Lateral cephalometric radiographs of pre-adolescent patients (8-13) years old.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Digital Lateral cephalometric radiographs of pre-adolescent patients (8-13) years old.
2. Cephalogram of good quality with all landmarks clearly visible
3. Presence of central incisors and first molars on cephalogram
4. Cephalogram with teeth in maximum intercuspation
Exclusion Criteria:
-
